001package org.consensusj.analytics.service;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
004import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
005
006/**
007 * Interface for reactive rich list service
008 *
009 * @param <N> Numeric type for balances
010 * @param <ID> Type for currency identifiers (e.g. String, Omni Currency ID, etc)
011 */
012public interface RichListService<N extends Number & Comparable<? super N>, ID> {
013
014    /**
015     * Return a single rich list
016     *
017     * @param currencyID The currency ID
018     * @param numEntries The requested number of entries in the list
019     * @return An RxJava Single for lazy access to the response
020     */
021    Single<TokenRichList<N, ID>> richList(ID currencyID, int numEntries);
022
023    /**
024     * Get a continuous stream of rich list updates
025     *
026     * @param currencyID The currency ID
027     * @param numEntries The requested number of entries in each list
028     * @return A Publisher for lazy access to the stream
029     */
030    Publisher<TokenRichList<N, ID>> richListUpdates(ID currencyID, int numEntries);
031}
